title: In Too Deep: Selling my Soul - Part Two
description: Tyson Reece is locked inside a world of depravity. His life held tight at the mercy of his ex-boyfriend, Kieran Wayland.DI Zara Mulaney continues to work tirelessly in the shadows, hoping to bring Wayland and his partner, her boss, Giovanni Mallea to justice.Reece is caught in the crosshairs between the undercover work of Mulaney and the evils of Wayland.Wayland has spies everywhere and one of them is talking.Has Reece’s deception been exposed?The saga continues to play out with the clock ticking and the crime lords at large. What Reece doesn’t realise is his head is already on a platter in this game of deceit, filth, and lies.With the candle burning quickly, will Reece and Mulaney get the proof they need before Wayland sets his repulsive plan into motion?
author: Zane Michaelson
